member.name: T:Frends.Office.ExportFileInput
member.summary: Input data class for exporting files to Sharepoint.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.ExportFileInput.SourceFilePath
member.summary: Full path of the target file to be written, e.g. c:\FileName.xlsx

member.name: P:Frends.Office.ExportFileInput.TargetFolderPath
member.summary: Target folder path on Sharepoint.

member.name: T:Frends.Office.SharepointAuthentication
member.summary: Input data class for authenticating to Sharepoint.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.SharepointAuthentication.ClientID
member.summary: Azure Active Directory Registered APP Client ID.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.SharepointAuthentication.ClientSecret
member.summary: Azure Active Directory Registered APP Client Secret.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.SharepointAuthentication.TenantID
member.summary: Azure Active Directory tenant ID.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.SharepointAuthentication.SiteID
member.summary: Sharepoint Site ID - retrievable from Microsoft API once the site is created.

member.name: T:Frends.Office.ExportFileToSharepointTask
member.summary: Office task for sending files to sharepoint.

member.name: M:Frends.Office.ExportFileToSharepointTask.ExportFileToSharepoint(Frends.Office.ExportFileInput,Frends.Office.SharepointAuthentication)
member.summary: Allows you to send files to sharepoint. Repository: https://github.com/MarcinMichnik-HiQ/Frends.Office

member.name: T:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput
member.summary: Input for excel file writers.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput.StringInput
member.summary: Input csv string.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput.CellDelimiter
member.summary: Determines what character will be used for splitting based on cell in csv. Deafult is ';'.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput.LineDelimiter
member.summary: Determines what string will be used for splitting lines. Default is "\r\n".

member.name: P:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput.TargetPath
member.summary: Full path of the target file to be written. File format should be .xlsx, e.g. FileName.xlsx

member.name: T:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileTask
member.summary: Used for writing Excel files.

member.name: M:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileTask.WriteExcelFile(Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileInput)
member.summary: Allows you to write excel files in .xlsx format. Repository: https://github.com/MarcinMichnik-HiQ/Frends.Office

member.name: M:Frends.Office.WriteExcelFileTask.CsvToDataTable(System.String,System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: This method parses the input csv string and returns DataTable object.

member.summary: Klasa zasobu wymagająca zdefiniowania typu do wyszukiwania zlokalizowanych ciągów itd.

member.summary: Zwraca buforowane wystąpienie ResourceManager używane przez tę klasę.

member.name: P:Frends.Office.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Przesłania właściwość CurrentUICulture bieżącego wątku dla wszystkich przypadków przeszukiwania zasobów za pomocą tej klasy zasobów wymagającej zdefiniowania typu.

member.summary: Input for file writers.

member.summary: Input string data.

member.summary: Determines what string will be used for splitting lines. Default is "\r\n".
